document.full_text: italians vote in local elections on sunday and monday, a test of how badly prime minister silvio berlusconi has been hurt by a sex scandal, three trials for corruption and a stagnating economy.
document.title: vote will show how badly berlusconi hurt by scandals
lines_and_colors: italians vote in local elections on sunday and monday, a test of how badly prime minister silvio berlusconi has been hurt by a sex scandal, three trials for corruption and a stagnating economy.
